artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 252, ōban #24.09
description: landscape view of open grassy area in foreground; thatch-roofed huts in LLQ; two figures near hut at left in middle ground; view down toward calm water with sailboats; low mountain in distance; from an accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Sights of the Fifty-Three Stations (Gojūsan tsugi meisho zue 五十三次名所圖會), also known as the Vertical Tōkaidō (Tate Tōkaidō)
title: 9, Ōisu
